summary: Full-stack AI-powered legal-tech web application called LexAI that analyzes legal case documents in Tamil and English, providing structured analysis including case summaries, legal issues, law sections, evidence evaluation, strength assessments for plaintiff/defendant, risk analysis, and neutral opinions with proper disclaimers.
architectural_notes: Full-stack architecture: React.js frontend + Python FastAPI backend
AI-powered analysis using OpenAI API for legal document processing
Bilingual support (Tamil/English) with automatic language detection via Langdetect
Translation pipeline using Googletrans for maintaining legal context
Document parsing with PyPDF2 for PDF/DOCX file processing
Chart.js for visual representation of strength percentages and risk levels
Structured JSON API responses with 11 analysis components
Safety-first approach: probability estimation only, no final verdicts, mandatory disclaimers

existing_features.title: Create a document upload interface that accepts PDF and DOCX files for legal case analysis
Implement language toggle between English and Tamil (தமிழ்) throughout the application interface
Create text input field for users to ask legal questions in Tamil or English
Add voice input capability that records and converts Tamil or English speech to text for legal questions

Display structured legal analysis results with all 11 components: Case Summary, Legal Issues, Law Sections, Evidence Evaluation, Plaintiff Strength (%), Defendant Strength (%), Strong Points, Weak Points, Risk Assessment, Neutral Opinion, and Legal Disclaimer
Integrate Chart.js to visualize plaintiff vs defendant strength percentages as interactive charts

Include prominent legal disclaimer in all analysis outputs stating that the system does not act as a real judge, does not provide final verdicts, only offers probability estimations, and users should consult qualified legal professionals

Design a professional legal-tech interface with a clean, trustworthy visual theme using sophisticated colors, clear typography, and structured layouts that inspire confidence while maintaining accessibility

new_feature_requests.summary: Document upload system supporting PDF and DOCX files
Bilingual input support with automatic Tamil/English language detection
Voice input capability for Tamil and English
